0.0: Come, lover, to welcome the bride
0.1: The face of Shabbat we will receive

1.1: We were caused to listen by the Unified God
1.2: Adonai is One, and His Name is One
1.3: To His name, and to glory and to praise!

2.0: To greet the Sabbath, come and we'll go
2.1: For she is a font of blessing
2.2: From the first, from of old, she was chosen
2.3: Made at the end, and planned from the start

3.0: O Holy Place of the King, city of sovereignty
3.1: Arise, escape from the midst of the chaos
3.2: Long have you sat in the valley of tears
3.3: And He will grant mercy, mercy upon you

4.0: Shake it off, from the ashes get up!
4.1: Put on the clothes of your glory, my people!
4.2: By the hand of the son of Jesse the Bethlehemite
4.3: Nearer to my soul is its redemption!

5.1: For your light has come! Get up, my light!
5.2: Wake up! Wake up! A song, speak out!
5.3: The glory of Adonai upon you is revealed!

6.0: Don't be ashamed! Don't be abashed!
6.1: Why be depressed? Why be upset?
6.2: In you my poor people will be sheltered
6.3: And she shall be rebuilt - the city on her hill!

7.0: And attacked shall be those who attack you
7.1: And far distant will be those who devoured you.
7.2: For you your God will rejoice
7.3: As a groom rejoices for his bride

8.0: Right and left you will break out
8.2: By the hand of the man of the line of Peretz
8.3: We will rejoice and we will sing

9.0: Come in peace, crown of her husband
9.1: As well in joy and in jubilation
9.2: The midst of the faithful precious nation
